GraphStorm
  • graphstorm.trainer
  • View page source

graphstorm.trainer

GraphStorm trainers assemble the distributed trainging pipeline for different tasks or different training methods.

If possible, users should always use these trainers to avoid handling the distributed processing and tasks.

Base class

GSgnnTrainer

Generic GSgnn trainer.

Task classes

GSgnnLinkPredictionTrainer

Link prediction trainer.

GSgnnNodePredictionTrainer

A trainer for node prediction

GSgnnEdgePredictionTrainer

Edge prediction trainer.

Method classes

GLEMNodePredictionTrainer

A trainer for node prediction
